attributes.review: This app is very disappointing, every one who downloads this app WAS hoping for reasons on why we should support you has our President, but you just proved on my we should’ve voted for Hillary. The app runs slow, and very little information that you can find from the news. So if anyone is reading this and thinking about downloading this DONT it’s a waste of your time. I’m guessing y’all had very high expectations from your president, but someone had to say it. This app should be taken off of the App Store because of all the ratings and bad reviews, so there is really no point. And I respect everyone who spoke their mind in the reviews (especially ones like mine). And another idiotic move this President has made, was putting hundreds at risk at his rally, who could have caught the virus.
attributes.title: A disgrace

attributes.review: After I downloaded this app I had to wait about a week before I could actually use it. My phone began to go through several problems from shutting down and restarting g over and over again. It went from black screen to back on again. This happened for about 3 hours after the app finally downloaded. Once my phone kinda worked again I wanted to see what ✨orange✨ was planning on for his election and how is going to make up for all the wrong he has done. The way the app works just makes it impossible to find d things. It took me like 30 minutes just to finally be able to navigate it. If your looking into downloading this app I suggest you not do it because it causes a lot of phone problems and it just isn’t handy.
attributes.title: Uh-oh✨

attributes.review: I was excited to finally stay up-to-date on the President’s latest news. My grandson helped me download this app and at first it was delightful. However, after a while the app constantly spams notifications. My phone is so slow and constantly glitching. I had never had a problem until I downloaded this app. The notifications go off all day and even in the middle of the night. My sleep has been disrupted. Even when I turn off the ringer bell my phone turns on and glitches and spams notifications. Sorry Mr. Trump, I don’t think I can stay on here any longer. I guess I’ll have to download the Twitter to stay up to date because this app is HORRIBLE! DO NOT DOWNLOAD! Save your SLEEP and your TIME! I HAVE NOT SLEPT IN SIX DAYS!!!!
attributes.title: REAL REVIEW

attributes.review:
it was a dark night.
the sun had set thirty minutes prior, but the remnants of the sun had long sense passed. i thought to myself, “i need to be updated on the presidency, it is my duty as an american citizen to know the important information of my republican president,” and so- i sat on my bed plastered in flowers and i downloaded his app. this... this was the first mistake of the night. you see, it was then- the power shut off. my heart began to beat faster. i couldn’t help but think.... “obama did this,” that’s when it happened....

this app is obama’s app, it is set up by the DEMOCRATS AND LEFT TO PROVIDE FALSE INFORMATION! IF YOU DOWNLOAD THIS APP YOU ARE SUPPORTING BLM! PLEASE! PLEASE! for your own safety. do not do this. as soon as you sign in, you are granting access to obama and the rest of his crusade. be warned, my fellow..... friends.
attributes.title: please do not download
